name: Art Story: Color Art Puzzle
description:
Let's dive into the world of classic novels in Art Story, a unique place where jigsaw meet coloring puzzle game for free.

Read bite-size book summaries, guess the silhouettes of puzzle art objects, and match the puzzle pieces into the right places to bring magnificent stories such as Gatsby, Romeo & Juliet, Frankenstein to life via relaxing & calming coloring animations.

Explore hundreds of beautiful HD art puzzles by different talented artists from over the world. Each puzzle is a gorgeous multilayered hand-drawn picture to tell those novel stories. There are The Great Gatsby, Pride & Prejudice, The Secret Garden, The Picture of Dorian Gray, Alice in Wonderland, The Wizard of Oz, Dracula, Macbeth, Jane Eyre, A Christmas Carol, and so many more novels.

Be careful, it looks easy, but interestingly challenging. Let's unfold those coloring stories daily in an immersive calming & soothing experience.

**Enjoy Art Story: Color Art Puzzle game for free:**

- A picture art puzzle game that is a fusion of two popular genres - art coloring and jigsaw puzzle. Players would try to fit pieces into the right places and see those puzzle completion in a short soothing animation.
- Creative writing to create bite-size classic literature novel summaries such as The Great Gatsby, Frankenstein while keeping the spirit of the book.
- Players play this relaxing game, collect Ink Drops coins to unlock stories (Over 400 puzzles at the moment, 25 books in progress) for their art library.
- Fascinating hand-drawn artworks from different artists, each with their own original & unique style. Hand-pick background music for each puzzle to match its mood.

Enchanting art visual, wonderful hand-pick background music, relaxing but challenging jigsaw coloring gameplay, why don't you relieve your stress and enliven your life daily with this soothing free art puzzle coloring game?
